content: Last night, when I was observing the sky, {A喜欢}I noticed a miraculous convergence of star trails... and sure enough, your friend came to visit today!
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-单一闲聊-主机联机-有其他玩家来拜访的心情-1005幻雪_联机对话（CB1）

content: But you seem to... really like my tails? You've been circling around me, {A婉拒}but my tails are... not for touching...
info: 日常对话-日常闲聊-单一闲聊-主机联机-有其他玩家来拜访的心情-1005幻雪_联机对话（CB1）
